mapper.select: select ur.id,ur.user_id,ur.role_id,u.name as user_name from sys_user_role ur left join sys_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where ur.role_id = #{roleId} order by ur.update_time desc

select distinct m.id,m.name,m.code,m.path,m.icon,m.sort,m.tree_id,m.parent_tree_id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id =#{userId} and m.type = #{type} order by m.sort
